description: s(n,a(n)) = max{s(n,k): k=1,2,...,n}, n >= 1, where s(n,k) = Stirling numbers of the second kind.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: a[n_] := (m = Max[t = Table[ StirlingS2[n, k], {k, 1, n}]]; Position[t, m][[1, 1]]); Table[a[n], {n, 1, 77}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 15 2011 *)
crossrefs: Cf. A002870 (maximum values), A008277 (triangle of Stirling numbers of the second kind).
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms retrieved from the b-file by _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 17 2008
